subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Dustin Johnson grabbed the U.S. Open lead, kept his composure and birdied the final two holes to take a three-stroke lead over the overnight leader Graeme McDowell and a five-stroke lead over Tiger Woods.
snippet: Dustin Johnson grabbed the U.S. Open lead, kept his composure and birdied the final two holes to take a three-stroke lead over the overnight leader Graeme McDowell and a five-stroke lead over Tiger Woods.
